definition: to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: No shares of stock against which the corporation holds unpaid claim shall be transferable in the books of the corporation.
sentences.chinese: 購股款未付清的股份不得在公司登記冊中過戶。

sentences.english: If how want house property transfer ownership to deal with to filial body directly?
sentences.chinese: 假如直接把房產過戶到子女身上要如何辦理？

sentences.english: I called at the bank and arranged to transfer some money．
sentences.chinese: 我到銀行去了一下，安排了款項過戶的事宜。

sentences.english: It takes three days to clear a check.
Jones assigned his home and farm to his creditors .
sentences.chinese: 瓊斯把他的家園和農場過戶給他的債權人。

sentences.english: Housing transfer unregistered, the validity of the contract?
sentences.chinese: 房屋過戶未登記，合同是否有效？

sentences.english: She signed her house over to her daughter.
sentences.chinese: 她簽字把她的房子過戶給她的女兒。

sentences.english: Share registrars in Hong Kong, Tricor Standard Limited, using this aerogram .
sentences.chinese: 條寄交本公司的股份過戶登記分處卓佳標準有限公司。

sentences.english: For second-hand housing transfer procedures, to provide temporary residence permits to buy it?
sentences.chinese: 辦理二手房過戶手續，需要購買人提供暫住證嗎？

sentences.english: Wire fees, transfer fees and other transaction fees are payable by customer.
sentences.chinese: 線材費，過戶費及其他交易須繳付費用由客戶。

definition: summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
